title: Anoma Foundation Plans Native Blockchain for Privacy-Focused Namada Protocol
description: The mainnet joins the ranks of at least 50 other blockchains in the crypto ecosystem as of Tuesday.

title: Coinbase-backed Base restores block production after more than 40 minutes outage
description:
Coinbase-backed layer2 network Base suffered a temporary outage that led to a stalled block production on Sept. 5. The blockchain network, however, has “identified and remediated” the issue and assured users that their funds were safe. According to its status page, Base’s stalled block production led to users having problems submitting new transactions on the […]

The post Coinbase-backed Base restores block production after more than 40 minutes outage appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Google Bets on ChainGPT's Web3 Vision with a Whopping $350,000 Grant
description: ChainGPT, the leading AI Infrastructure provider for the crypto, blockchain, and Web3 industry has put its best foot forward and applied to the Google Cloud Web3 Startup Program.

title: China Wants the Digital Yuan to Be Ubiquitous in Retail Payments Arena
description: China is pushing for universal national adoption of the digital yuan, with People’s Bank of China’s (PBOC) officials stating the currency should be available for all retail payment scenarios. The recent introduction of a standard for QR-based payment codes is part of this move, which also seeks to make wholesale payments interoperable with the digital […]

title: Yuga Labs stirs up interest in Bitcoin ordinals with cipher puzzle series
description: The world of Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) continues to captivate as Yuga Labs, the creative studio behind the infamous Bored Ape Yacht Club, ventures deeper into the cryptosphere. The NFT giant is adding another layer of complexity and thrill to its audience engagement by launching a 13-week cipher puzzle series. Based on its Twelvefold Bitcoin NFT ... Read more

title: Zoom Introduces AI-Powered Assistant to Boost User Productivity
description: Zoom, a prominent video conferencing and collaboration solutions provider, has introduced an innovative feature to its suite: the AI-powered assistant. This AI-driven companion is now accessible to all paid subscribers at no extra cost, aiming to redefine productivity and streamline various tasks within the Zoom platform. title: Tech Anxiety on the Rise Among Senior Leaders Due to Rapid Technological Advancements
description: A staggering 94% of senior business leaders are grappling with ‘tech anxiety,’ according to a new study by global digital transformation consultancy, Kin + Carta. The phenomenon of tech anxiety is linked to the rapid pace of technological advancements, particularly in the areas of cybersecurity, AI, and machine learning. This sentiment is driving business leaders ... Read more

title: Crypto Analysts Warn: Spot Bitcoin ETF Approval Could Send XRP Price to $5, $10 and Beyond
description: Crypto analysts have pointed out the massive opportunity presented by the approval of a spot Bitcoin ETF, deeming it reckless not to aggressively accumulate. title: One Ethereum Rival at ‘Screaming’ Low Prices Amid Institutional Interest: InvestAnswers
description:
